text: The Ill (all capitals: ILL) is a tributary of the Rhine in the western Austrian state of Vorarlberg. It flows from the northern slopes of the Silvretta mountain range and then runs north-west through Vorarlberg. The Ill passes through the Montafon and valleys and the town Feldkirch. It joins the river Rhine a few kilometers northwest of Feldkirch ("Illspitz"), at the border with Switzerland. The Ill has several dams with hydroelectric power stations. Category:Rivers of Vorarlberg Category:Bregenz Forest Mountains Category:Verwall Alps Category:Silvretta Alps Category:Rivers of Austria
title: Ill (Vorarlberg)
